      • parseValue

        public long parseValue()
        This returns the current value of the field, without reformatting the value in the field. This is only available in Moneydance as of build 281.

      • getValue

        public long getValue()
        Get the value of the field as an amount in the current currency. If there was an error parsing, this will beep and the field requests focus again.

      • parseValue

        public long parseValue​(java.lang.String text)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Parse the given text and return the resulting value in the same way that user input is parsed.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
